about.title: About Me
about.professionalDescription: I am passionate about continuous learning and exploring new technologies, which is reflected in my numerous personal practice projects. Currently, I work as a frontend developer, where I apply my skills in creating attractive and functional interfaces.
about.backendExperience: I have gained significant experience in backend development, working with Node.js, TypeScript, Mongoose, and MongoDB, where I have developed robust and scalable applications. In my last work experience, I extensively used Docker, which allowed me to optimize the development and deployment of applications. Additionally, I have basic knowledge of PostgreSQL, providing me with a broader understanding of relational databases.
about.interests: I am interested in further deepening my knowledge of technologies such as AWS, .NET, and Python, while continuing to specialize in backend development.
about.personalDescription: As you can see, this page is like a square, right? Well, if you are viewing it from a computer ðŸ˜…. I have always liked dark and retro themes, so I enjoy having this style in my portfolio as well. I explain this because it might seem strange that the page looks this way... Let's continue.

about.values: I enjoy studying and being a good person to others. Teaching others and fostering a positive work environment is one of my goals in every company I have worked for.
about.contactMessage: I hope you find this site and the information I have shared about myself interesting. Feel free to reach out!
